items.sentence: I still have many clear memories of my school days.
I went to Hawaii on vacation for a couple of weeks.
I ran across a rare book in a secondhand bookstore.
I put the used syringes in a can for safe disposal.
I want to fly more than anything else in the world.
I don't like the polluted atmosphere of big cities.
I get nervous when I speak before a large audience.
I have to submit sales projections twice a quarter.
I don't use taxis unless it's absolutely necessary.
I can assure you that honesty pays in the long run.
I was quite upset at the sudden change in the plan.
I mistook you for your sister when I first saw you.
I had gone some distance before I missed my wallet.
I heard a strange sound coming from the room above.
There's a supermarket not too far from Tom's house.
I wonder where in the world Tom could be right now.
I think Tom is clever enough to solve this problem.
We'll make a restroom stop at the next gas station.
We'll just have to wait and see how things pan out.
I'll bet you can't guess what happened to me today.
